preferences.title: Anthropic API Key

preferences.name: model
preferences.description: Model to use for API commands. For OpenAI: GPT-5.x/4.1.x. For Anthropic: Claude models. For Ollama: set model name below.
preferences.title: Model

preferences.name: ollamaEndpoint
preferences.title: Ollama Endpoint
preferences.description: URL for Ollama server (only used with Ollama provider)

preferences.description: Model name for Ollama (e.g., llama3, mistral, codellama)

preferences.description: Choose which browser to use by default for all commands

preferences.description: Choose how to receive AI results for API-based commands

preferences.name: sidenote

preferences.description: Enable SideNote integration (requires SideNote). Allows you to send the results to SideNote as a new note.
preferences.label: Enabled
